```{r}
refrigirator <- list(
  drinkS = c("麒麟","虎牌","雪山","金牌"),
  fruit = c("蘋果","番茄","鳳梨"),
  vegetable = c("小白菜","高麗菜","菠菜","空心菜")
)
refrigirator

refrigirator[[1]]
refrigirator[["vegetable"]]
```

若只想取麒麟出來
```{r}
refrigirator[[1]][[1]]
refrigirator[["drinkS"]][[1]]
```

若想拿出所有的青菜及水果
```{r}
refrigirator[c("fruit","vegetable")]
```

用[  ] 會保有原來的class
所以出來的東西還是list
```{r}
a <- refrigirator[c("fruit","vegetable")]
aa <- refrigirator[[1]]
aaa <- refrigirator[1]
class(a)
class(aa)
class(aaa)
```
